songs.title: ​masquerade

description.plain: masquerade is a song by Sioxxie released in 2020. It was “underground” until around August/September 2021 when the song made it’s big debut on the social media platform TikTok.

songs.embed_content: Read “​masquerade” by ​slaywitme on Genius

songs.title: ​cupcakes.mp3

description.plain:
Likely designed to be based off of the “insane cupcake killer” character that Pinkie Pie has become in Internet creepypastas, cupcakes.mp3 is a hyperpop and experimental hip hop single by Siouxxie. The song follows Pinkie as she literally turns her friends into cupcakes.

The song could possibly be based off of several internet videos that surfaced years ago that reference a more insane side to Pinkie Pie, which are My Little Pony Cupcakes Animated and Cupcakes HD.

songs.embed_content: Read “​cupcakes.mp3” by ​slaywitme on Genius

songs.title: ​ketamine

description.plain: Ketamine is the 4th song to be featured on Siouxxie’s debut album: Witchpop. It was released as a single prior to the album’s debut.

songs.embed_content: Read “​ketamine” by ​slaywitme on Genius

body.plain: Ketamine is the 4th song to be featured on Siouxxie’s debut album: Witchpop. It was released as a single prior to the album’s debut.
